suite.name: CreateCharaters

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.
kw.msg: &{usuario} = { email=papito@yahoo.com }

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/accounts path_url=/accounts headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.26.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '29', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"email": "papito@yahoo.com"}'
${response} = <Response [200]>

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: DELETE
kw.msg: DELETE Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/delorean path_url=/delorean headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.26.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'client_key': '61301752874ab200165f1301', 'Content-Length': '0'} body=None

kw.name: Factory Star Lord
kw.msg: ${personagem} = {'name': 'Peter Quill', 'aliases': 'Star Lord', 'age': 30, 'team': 'Guardians of the Galaxy', 'active': True}

kw.name: POST New Character
POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/characters path_url=/characters headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.26.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'client_key': '61301752874ab200165f1301', 'Content-Length': '109', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "Peter Quill", "aliases": "Star Lord", "age": 30, "team": "Guardians of the Galaxy", "active": true}'
${response} = <Response [200]>
${response} = <Response [200]>

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

kw.name: Factory Groot
kw.msg: ${personagem} = {'name': 'Groot', 'aliases': 'Groot', 'age': 300, 'team': 'Guardians of the Galaxy', 'active': True}

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/characters path_url=/characters headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.26.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'client_key': '61301752874ab200165f1301', 'Content-Length': '100', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "Groot", "aliases": "Groot", "age": 300, "team": "Guardians of the Galaxy", "active": true}'
${response} = <Response [200]>

POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/characters path_url=/characters headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.26.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'client_key': '61301752874ab200165f1301', 'Content-Length': '100', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "Groot", "aliases": "Groot", "age": 300, "team": "Guardians of the Galaxy", "active": true}'
${response} = <Response [409]>
